title: >>> SURPRISE, SURPRISE
body_text:
So you've heard it all before:
"Big surprise planned for dodgeball this weekend!"
...
This time is the real deal. It's as real as the invasion of LX3.
DODGEBALL 78
The great game of dodgeball heads into the last remaining events of Season 8, beginning this three-week period at Saturday's DODGEBALL 78.
Rumors have been running rampant about a "big surprise" supposedly taking place at the inaugural March spectacular. What could possibly happen that hasn't happened already?
Find out what all the commotion is about March 3.
You will not want to miss this one.
"Dover Taken Over" ... on DVD!
Those that would like to purchase the critically acclaimed "Toms River Tournament" DVD can do so by simply bringing
$2
to this Saturday's DODGEBALL 78.
DVD Info:
- Relive every match featuring the
O.R.P. Knights
- Special music and video treatments added
- Approx. run time 25 minutes
For further information, please forward all questions to Ryan McCrorey.
________________________________________
**DODGEBALL 79 is a special afternoon event on March 10, beginning at 3pm. Celebrating 25 years of Chris Adams!
**DODGEBALL 80 comes full speed March 17. Wait until you hear what's in store in the coming days.
